https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qmSOSlllIHTub75Bz4MhEQjCR7S.jpg A pair of thrill-seeking nerds pioneer a new extreme craze that doesn't so much sweep the nation as portions of a small faction of their high school. The craze is 'boxboarding,' really just rolling down a hill with your vision obstructed. Boxboarders!
